metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2478 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: mm-video-v4l2/vidc/vdec/src/omx_vdec_msm8974.cpp in mediaserver in Android4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before2016-06-01 mishandles pointers, which allows attackers to gain privilegesvia a crafted application, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature orSignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 27475409.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
